item.description:
### Reward

Control the rewards that created in philia.

Rewards defined with different conditions for segments of users.

you can :

1. get claimed rewards for all users
    
2. get claimable rewards for a user
    
3. get detail of a reward
    
4. claim a reward
    
5. get list of claimed rewards for a user
    
6. burn a reward code
    
7. get rewards that contain single or multiple products
